body: Whenever I press tab, (the player list) it doesn't show colors so I can never see who's on my team. How do I fix this?
body_tagged: Whenever I press tab, (the player list) it doesn't show colors so I can never see who's on my team. How do I fix this?
title: Idk waht to call this...

replies.body: Do you have special ressourcepacks or mods?
replies.body_tagged: Do you have special ressourcepacks or mods?

replies.body: Possibly the update to the whole minecraft app.
replies.body_tagged: Possibly the update to the whole minecraft app.

replies.body:
I get this sometimes.
It's when every single name in the tab is white right?
I can't remember how I fixed it...
If you're playing on 1.7, update to 1.8.
I think that's how I did it...
replies.body_tagged:
I get this sometimes.

I can't remember how I fixed it...

replies.body: It works for me and I play on 1.7.4 because it's less laggy.
replies.body_tagged: It works for me and I play on 1.7.4 because it's less laggy.

replies.body: For me its the exact opposite. If I am in 1.8 I cant see the names coloured anymore. As soon as I switch back to 1.7 it works again.
